original_text: There was a crowd of happy men around them. They included men who came from the desert and who were drunk. They put rings on the sisters' hands and beautiful crowns on their heads. There was a crowd of happy men around them. They included men who came from the desert and who were drunk. They put rings on the sisters' hands and beautiful crowns on their heads.
korean_text: 그 무리와 편히 지껄이고 즐겼으며 또 광야에서 잡류와 술 취한 사람을 청하여 오매 그들이 팔찌를 그 손목에 끼우고 아름다운 관을 그 머리에 씌웠도다

sentences.original_text: There was a crowd of happy men around them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 주위에 기쁜 남자들의 무리가 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: They included men who came from the desert
They put rings on the sisters' hands
and beautiful crowns on their heads.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들의 머리에 아름다운 관을 씌웠습니다.

sentences.original_text: There was a crowd of happy men around them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 주위에 기쁜 남자들의 무리가 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: They included men who came from the desert
They put rings on the sisters' hands
and beautiful crowns on their heads.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들의 머리에 아름다운 관을 씌웠습니다.
